  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 450 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphical card supporting DirectX11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 426 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 / 8.1 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Equivalent to Intel Core2 Duo or higher.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL compliant
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 / 8.1 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Equivalent to Intel Core i3-4340 or higher.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL compliant
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
